title: 针对亚洲大型企业的隐秘网络间谍活动：DLL劫持及社交媒体C2攻击
title_translated: Secret cyber espionage against large Asian enterprises: DLL hijacking and social media C2 attacks
summary: The Kabaski laboratory has revealed a highly confusing web-based espionage campaign targeting Russian IT companies and global business agencies. The attack consisted of a multistage delivery chain, culminating in the deployment of Cobalt Strike Beacon.

title: 诺基亚遭遇公司史上最严重数据泄露事件，内部网络遭入侵
title_translated: Nokia suffered the worst data leak in the company's history and the internal network was hacked.
summary: The threat to attacker Tsar0Byte claimed to have invaded Nokia's network through a porous third-party link, resulting in the disclosure of sensitive data for over 94,500 employees. The incident was brought to light at dark web forums such as DarkForums and was one of the most serious corporate data leaks affecting Nokia in recent years.

title: 人工智能可能修复帮助传播了 15 年的漏洞
title_translated: The repair of artificial intelligence may have helped spread a 15-year gap.
summary: No CVE identified or described vulnerability.

title: Прямой ущерб Столичек и Неофарма от кибератаки оценили до полумиллиарда
title_translated: Direct damage to Stolits and Neopharm from cyberattacks estimated to half a billion
summary: Cyber attack on pharmacy chains 'Stolichka' and 'Neopharm' caused 500 million rubles in damage. The attack affected corporate systems, including accounting, cash register, and product tracking module.

title: Вышел Linux 6.16: улучшения для ARM64, графики и звуковых систем
title_translated: Linux 6.16 Released: Improvements to ARM64, Graphics and Sound Systems
summary: Linux 6.16 kernel release announcement with key changes and no identified CVE.

title: В iOS 26 Safari включит защиту от фингерпринта по умолчанию
title_translated: In iOS 26 Safari will include protection from fingerprint print by default
summary: Apple's Safari browser will default to advanced digital fingerprint protection, preventing websites from tracking users' browsing habits. This protection was previously only available in private mode.

title: iOS 18.6: Apple закрыла уязвимости в Safari, Mail и обработке медиа
title_translated: iOS 18.6: Apple has closed vulnerabilities in Safari, Mail and media processing
summary: Apple has released iOS 18.6 with a list of important patches, addressing dozens of vulnerabilities and covering some that could allow exploitation.

title: Фейковая рассылка от Belarusian Cyber-Partisans: угрозы атак на ЦБ и ФСИН
title_translated: Fake newsletter from Belarusian Cyber-Partisans: threats of attacks on the Central Bank and the Federal Penitentiary Service
summary: Mass mailing of emails on behalf of Belarusian Cyber-Partisans group, demanding release of Pavel Vrublevsky. No specific vulnerability or exploitation process reported.

title: У Почты России наблюдаются сбои в работе сайта и онлайн-сервисов
title_translated: Russian Post is experiencing failures in the work of the site and online services
summary: Russian Post website and Mail of Russia app experienced failures, but no CVE identified. Stolichki pharmacy network and Aeroflot had separate incidents with unknown CVEs.

title: Неизвестные злоумышленники атаковали сеть Семейный доктор
title_translated: Unknown attackers attacked the network Family Doctor
summary: Family Doctor clinics network was subjected to a cyber attack, resulting in patient database destruction. Clinic's website and appointment system were also affected.

title: Аферисты обещают карту на 100 тыс. рублей и просят 3050 рублей «комиссии»
title_translated: Scammers promise a card for 100 thousand rubles and ask for 3050 rubles “commission”
summary: Scammers are targeting vulnerable citizens, promising credit cards with high interest rates and stealing personal data. The attack involves filling out a questionnaire and providing sensitive information.

title: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
title_translated: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
summary: PaperCut NG/MF contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, which could potentially enable an attacker to alter security settings or execute arbitrary code.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and root privileges. Successful exploitation could be done by submitting a crafted API request.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-6965: Important: nodejs:22 security update (ALSA-2025-11803)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-6965: Important: nodejs:22 security update (ALSA-2025-11803)
summary: A vulnerability exists in SQLite versions before 3.50.2, leading to memory corruption and potentially exploitable issue.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-5994: Important: unbound security update (Multiple Advisories)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-5994: Important: unbound security update (Multiple Advisories)
summary: A multi-vendor cache poisoning vulnerability named 'Rebirthday Attack' has been discovered in caching resolvers that support EDNS Client Subnet (ECS).
